dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 243 IH: Nevada Land Sovereignty Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Amodei introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend title 54, United States Code, to prohibit the further extension or establishment of national monuments in the State of Nevada except by express authorization of Congress.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Nevada Land Sovereignty Act.

section.header: Limitation on further extension or establishment of national monuments in the State of Nevada
section.text: Section 320301(d) of title 54, United States Code, is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in the subsection heading, by inserting or Nevada after Wyoming; and
by inserting or Nevada after Wyoming.
